faq.description: We answer the most common questions about our services. Didn't find what you're looking for? Contact us.

questions.question: What is the average timeline for a visual identity project?
questions.answer: The timeline varies according to the project's complexity, but generally a complete project takes between 4 to 8 weeks, from strategic immersion to final delivery of the brand manual.

questions.question: What is included in the visual identity project?
questions.answer: We include complete logo, color palette, typographies, applications in different contexts, detailed brand manual, editable files and technical support for implementation.

questions.question: Do you work with redesign of existing brands?
questions.answer: Yes! We perform both creation of visual identities from scratch and strategic redesign of brands that need to reposition or evolve visually in the market.

questions.question: How does investment in a project work?
questions.answer: The investment is defined after we understand the specific needs of your project. We send a detailed proposal with scope, deadlines and values. We work with facilitated installments.

questions.question: Do you offer support after project delivery?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer technical support to ensure that the visual identity implementation happens correctly. We also provide additional consulting when necessary.
